# polaris_data_center_archival_location (Data Source)

The `polaris_data_center_archival_location` data source is used to access information about
a data center archival location for a specific cluster. An archival location is looked
up using the cluster ID and archival location name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polaris_sla_source_cluster" "mycluster1" {
  name = "MY-CLUSTER-1"
}

# Look up an archival location by cluster ID and name.
data "polaris_data_center_archival_location" "archival_location" {
  cluster_id = data.polaris_sla_source_cluster.mycluster1.id
  name       = "my-archival-location"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) Cluster ID (UUID).
- `name` (String) Name of the archival location.

### Read-Only

- `active` (Boolean) Whether the archival location is active.
- `cluster_name` (String) Name of the cluster.
- `cluster_status` (String) Status of the cluster.
- `cluster_version` (String) Version of the cluster.
- `id` (String) Archival location ID (UUID).
- `status` (String) Status of the archival location.
- `target_type` (String) Type of the archival target.
